name: Critical Shanty Town Wars 3D
description:
You have lot of weapons to kill soldiers in this game while traveling through the Shanty Town.
They want to capture the city and you are the only hindrance on their way.

Key features:
- The game is completely free !
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Easy controls - you don't need to move and attack at once - just aim and shoot !
- Lot of weapons - pistol, automatic gun, sniper rifle and other
- Sniper zoom in/out modes
- Detailed scenes with sounds
